link_desc: Simple web app writing on python(flask) for viewing, selecting and exporting windows performance counters to zabbix templates thru api. Support export independent of system language type by performance counters id's. I used this app for creating items in zabbix 4.2 to get data from performance counters of MS SQL Server by id's. But I think this will work with an older version of zabbix.
tags: Windows, Performance counters, MS SQL, API
author: Aleksandr Gvozdev
